Question.Subject: How do I email Frank Warren?
Question.Content: I never understood how people comment on others' secrets, and sometimes, I want to say something too, but I don't understand where I email my message to? Does anyone know? Frank Warren is the guy who created Postsecret by the way
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Dear person who answered before me, Who doesn't know who Frank Warren is?
To answer your question, I heard that his email is frank@docdel.com I think you can also post threads on the post secret community board, but as far as his email, I think it is the one I just said. Hope this helps!

Answer.Content: Who the heck is Frank Warren?

Dear person who answered before me, Who doesn't know who Frank Warren is?
To answer your question, I heard that his email is frank@docdel.com I think you can also post threads on the post secret community board, but as far as his email, I think it is the one I just said. Hope this helps!
